items.title: North Korean soldier captured in Ukraine dies, reports say
items.description: The soldier is thought to be the first North Korean prisoner of war captured in the Russia-Ukraine conflict.

items.title: S Korean crypto-boss Do Kwon to be extradited to US
items.description: The man behind the collapse of terraUSD and Luna tokens faces fraud charges in the Unites States.

items.title: Iran arrests Italian reporter, Italy says
items.description: Cecilia Sala has been under arrest in Iran for more than a week, Italy's foreign ministry says.

items.title: Nigeria denies colluding with France to destabilise Niger
items.description: Nigeria says Niger's accusations are "baseless" and "false".

items.title: Driver who killed dozens in China car attack sentenced to death
items.description: Fan Weiqiu was angry about his divorce settlement, and took it out on strangers, the court said.
